text:
また、お昼休みなど、職員さんのご意見伺えそうでしたら、話しかけると思いますので、よろしくお願いいたします。
＜制定等要旨＞
特定業務職員制度創設に伴う就業規則の制定及び一部改正
＜制定する就業規則＞
国立大学法人大阪大学特定業務職員給与規程
＜一部改正する就業規則＞
国立大学法人大阪大学教職員就業規則
国立大学法人大阪大学教職員給与規程
trans:
Additionally, if there is an opportunity to hear opinions from staff members during lunch breaks or other times, I may approach them, so I appreciate your cooperation in advance.
<Summary of Establishment>
Creation and partial revision of employment regulations accompanying the establishment of the Special Duties Staff System
<Employment Regulations to Be Established>
Salary Regulations for Special Duties Staff of Osaka University National University Corporation
<Employment Regulations to Be Partially Revised>
Employment Regulations for Faculty and Staff of Osaka University National University Corporation
Salary Regulations for Faculty and Staff of Osaka University National University Corporation
